data.name: Memento Vivere
data.detailed_description:
PRESENTATION


Dekar is a noble warrior, heir to the throne, who has a estranged relationship with his father while nourishing a great love for his late mother. After abandoning his rights to the throne and choosing to live a simple life, one day everything changes for him, when a Winged One, crashes into his village asking for his help. The fate of the world now lies on his shoulders.

Memento Vivere is a classic 2D RPG in the style of Valiant Resurrection and Skyfall.

FEATURES


  • Classic Good versus Evil Storyline!
  • Beatifully composed Soundtrack!
  • Sidequests to complete!
  • Special weapons to find!
  • Difficulty Modes to choose from!

MORE GAMES


https://store.steampowered.com/app/370690/Elendia_Ceus/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1031220/Champions_of_Thora/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/618760/IronBorn/

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
